flavorText: . . . but every end is a new beginning.

foreignData.flavorText: … doch jedes Ende ist auch ein neuer Anfang.
foreignData.name: Reise in die Ewigkeit // Atzal, Höhle der Ewigkeit
foreignData.text:
(Transformierte Reise in die Ewigkeit.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Bringe eine Kreaturenkarte deiner Wahl aus deinem Friedhof ins Spiel zurück.

foreignData.flavorText: ... pero todo final es un nuevo comienzo.
foreignData.name: Viaje a la eternidad // Atzal, cueva de la eternidad
foreignData.text:
(Se transforma del Viaje a la eternidad.)
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color a tu reserva de maná.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio al campo de batalla.

foreignData.flavorText: ... mais chaque fin est un nouveau départ.
foreignData.name: Voyage vers l'Éternité // Atzal, caverne de l'Éternité
foreignData.text:
(Transformation du Voyage vers l'Éternité.)
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix à votre réserve.
{3}{B}{G}, {T} : Renvoyez une carte de créature ciblée depuis votre cimetière sur le champ de bataille.

foreignData.flavorText: ... ma ogni fine è un nuovo inizio.
foreignData.name: Viaggio Verso l'Eternità // Atzal, Grotta dell'Eternità
foreignData.text:
(Si trasforma dal Viaggio Verso l'Eternità.)
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore alla tua riserva di mana.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Rimetti sul campo di battaglia una carta creatura bersaglio dal tuo cimitero.

foreignData.flavorText: ……いかなる終わりも新たな始まりである。
foreignData.name: 永遠への旅 // 永遠の洞窟、アザル
foreignData.text:
（永遠への旅から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{3}{B}{G}, {T}：あなたの墓地からクリーチャー・カード１枚を対象とし、それを戦場に戻す。

foreignData.flavorText: . . . 그러나 모든 끝은 새로운 시작으로 이어진다.
foreignData.name: 영원으로의 여행 // 영원의 동굴, 아트잘
foreignData.text:
(영원으로의 여행에서 변신함.)
{T}: 당신의 마나풀에 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 담는다.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 전장으로 되돌린다.

foreignData.flavorText: ... mas cada fim é um novo começo.
foreignData.name: Jornada para a Eternidade // Atzal, Caverna da Eternidade
foreignData.text:
(Transformação de Jornada para a Eternidade.)
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor à sua reserva de mana.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Devolva o card de criatura alvo de seu cemitério para o campo de batalha.

foreignData.name: Путешествие в Вечность // АЦАЛЬ, ПЕЩЕРА ВЕЧНОСТИ
foreignData.text:
(Трансформируется из Путешествия в Вечность.)
{T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета в ваше хранилище маны.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: верните целевую карту существа из вашего кладбища на поле битвы.

foreignData.name: 追寻永生 // 转生洞穴阿札尔
foreignData.text:
（由追寻永生转化。）
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。
{3}{B}{G}，{T}：将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

foreignData.name: 追尋永生 // 轉生洞穴阿札爾
foreignData.text:
（由追尋永生轉化。）
{T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力到你的魔法力池中。
{3}{B}{G}，{T}：將目標生物牌從你的墳墓場移回戰場。

name: Journey to Eternity // Atzal, Cave of Eternity
originalText:
(Transforms from Journey to Eternity.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{3}{B}{G}, {T}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

rulings.text: If another player gains control of the enchanted creature, Journey to Eternity will be put into your graveyard.
If Journey to Eternity and the enchanted creature are both put into graveyards at the same time, Journey to Eternity’s ability will return both to the battlefield.

If Journey to Eternity enchants a creature you control but don’t own, the creature will return to the battlefield under your control from its owner’s graveyard when it dies. In a multiplayer game, if a player leaves the game, all cards that player owns leave as well. If you leave the game, any creatures you control from Journey to Eternity’s effect are exiled.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).
